Record numbers (Sea/Ocean classification): Adriatic Sea: 13 , Balearic Sea: 1 , Indian Ocean: 1 , Ionian Sea: 2 , Ligurian Sea: 1 , Mediterranean Sea: 1 , Tyrrhenian Sea: 5 ;
total: 24 .

Record numbers (FAO classification): FAO 37 : 23 , FAO 51 : 1 ;
total: 24 .

Remarks: This is a Mediterranean species from the
sargassi
group reported almost exclusively from the Mediterranean basin, except for one relatively recent report from the Indian Ocean. It has been found in the intertidal and subtidal zones, down to 80 m bsl, in different types of sand and sediments (also present in marine caves).
